channel.title: cloudera manager on Fatkun's Blog

item.title: cloudera manager添加hive时报错找不到jdbc driver
item.description: cm 4.7 报错 JDBC driver cannot be found. Unable to find the JDBC database jar on host 解决方法 把包放入这个目录，注意文件名要保持一致 /usr/share/java/mysql-connector-java.jar 来源 https://groups.google.com/a/cloudera.org/forum/#!topic/cdh-user/OpXSfmzsnuo
